chapter.title: YDBase: the base class
chapter.para: The YDBase class is the base class for most of the classes in the Yellow Duck Framework. It provides a number of base functions that are available to all the classes. The following methods are part of all the classes based on YDBase:

itemizedlist.listitem: getClassName: returns the name of the class in lowercase.
hasMethod: checks if the specified method exists in the class definition.
isSubClass: checks if the class has the specified class as one of it's parents.
getAncestors: returns the list of parent classes.
serialize: returns the serialized version of the class instance which can be e.g. saved to a file.
